sentences.english: Chiba Prefecture, Japan ABIKO a city, not far from Tokyo.

sentences.english: When you want to escape the city you can always head for Chiba and the Mihama-en garden.

sentences.english: The tremor was also felt in Tokyo as well as Fukushima, Chiba, Kanagawa and Shizuoka prefectures.

sentences.english: The first prize was won by Masato Chiba from Japan.

sentences.english: Mr. Noda was elected a member of the Chiba prefectural assembly in 1987 at the age of 29.
sentences.chinese: 1987年，29岁的野田佳彦当选千叶县议会议员。

sentences.english: Japanese Sonny Chiba of Japan was picked as a possible successor in such movies as "the Bodyguard".

sentences.english: She also set up a group to study the death penalty.
